idea-plugin.name: Sorbet LSP
idea-plugin.description:
Language Server Protocol (LSP) integration for Sorbet, a fast, powerful type checker for Ruby.

Features

  • Real-time type checking and diagnostics
  • Go to definition and type definitions
  • Hover for type information
  • Code completion powered by Sorbet
  • Find all references
  • Document symbols and code outline
  • Quick fixes and code actions

Requirements

  • Sorbet gem installed (gem install sorbet)
  • Configured Sorbet project (srb init)
  • Watchman (recommended for optimal performance)

Note: This plugin requires RubyMine or IntelliJ IDEA Ultimate with Ruby plugin.
